name: Roomba Rumble (Daniel8a, Kobi Saha)
description:
Roomba Rumble is a wacky arcade game about vacuuming your room with an input-delayed robot.

Clean as much of your room as you can before the Roomba’s battery runs out. Try not to run into anything, or your Roomba will go back to the start!

Controls: Arrow Keys to change the Roomba's direction.

Design/Engineering: Daniel Ochoa & Kobi Saha

Art: Popper Zhu

Music: Aria Dewey
